content: 2 lots of fractionals up for grabsBids will work on the LIFO system as seen in previous auctionsie: 1 @ xxBTC, up to the maximum amount of items per lotLOT 1: 4x 2018 Moonbits 1k bits chips (each loaded with 0.001BTC)#T2590: https://blockchain.info/address/1KihX5XdE6HYxeZEd4K6Zht5n9kMCPpBSt#T2591: https://blockchain.info/address/1AEjkM1h3e8teJ5HNVK49jJYDTFV9nxon7#T2595: https://blockchain.info/address/1EGKD68NnkYNGQq3QghvLj4byQ45nQFz1L#T2596: https://blockchain.info/address/1CVwsnUbY5b9b53Wet1pMSes6umY1PT5A8LOT 2: 3x 2017 Satori chips (each loaded with 0.001BTC)#037027: https://blockchain.info/address/1Fk1vkWsAWjDC8YZfXYAwyTW652LRgkXTi#037030: https://blockchain.info/address/1Fpx8zh1Sv4wfejaMKXxmn7bziBHyiNJZa#037031: https://blockchain.info/address/1KMWi79JpRrt2XSXUafRsieN7ubepezw3RSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTCPlease limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal placesEND TIME: OCTOBER 2nd, 2023, 14:00:00 PDTPayment due within 24 hours of auction end!!SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: bc1q0mj9njt50045qfuzewc4rut7su7cvg8nt89j3cSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
